fw.name: ToolPathEditorInterfaces
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: CATIMfg3DToolPathVisu
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to Tool path objects 3D Visualization.

class.name: CATIMfg3DToolPathVisuData
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to the management of datas for Tool path Visualization.

method.name: CanDrawCircle
method.abstract: Retrieves how circle motions are displayed.

method.name: DrawCircle
method.abstract: Sets how circle motions are displayed.

method.name: GetCornerRadius
method.abstract: Retrieves the corner radius of the tool.

method.name: GetDisplayMode
method.abstract: Retrieves points display mode.

method.name: GetPointsRep
method.abstract: Retrieves the rep of the points of the tool path.

method.name: GetPolylineRep
method.abstract: Retrieves the polyline rep of the tool path.

method.name: SetCornerRadius
method.abstract: Sets the corner radius of the tool.

method.name: SetDisplayMode
method.abstract: Sets points display mode.

method.name: SetWithHoles
method.abstract: Displays or not tool path holes.

method.name: WithHoles
method.abstract: Checks if tool path holes are displayed.

class.name: CATIMfgTPECutAreasEditor
class.abstract: Interface to manage commands in the cut areas tool bar of the tool path editor.

method.name: BeginPolylineToCut
method.abstract: Indicates to the cut area editor that designation of polyline begin.

method.name: ClearAll
method.abstract: Destroys all representations of last command.

method.name: EndPolylineToCut
method.abstract: Indicates to the cut area editor that designation of polyline end.

method.name: GetPointsToolPathRep
method.abstract: Gets the representation of points of the tool path.

method.name: GetToolPath
method.abstract: Gets the tool path.

method.name: GetToolPathRep
method.abstract: Gets the representation of the tool path.

method.name: HideToolPathRep
method.abstract: Hides the representation of the tool path.

method.name: LoadCuttingGeometry
method.abstract: Gives to the cut area editor a list of points to cut the tool path like in the action "Cut by a polygon".

method.name: LoadOneCuttingPoint
method.abstract: Gives to the cut area editor a points which is on a trajectory to split the tool path in two.

method.name: LoadOnePoint
method.abstract: Gives to the cut area editor a points which belongs to the tool path to split it in two.

method.name: LoadPolylineToCut
method.abstract: Indicates to the cut area editor the list of polyline to cut.

method.name: LoadTwoPoints
method.abstract: Gives to the cut area editor two points to split the tool path between these two points.

method.name: SetProjectionAxis
method.abstract: Indicates to the direction of projection to the algorithm of cut.

method.name: ShowToolPathRep
method.abstract: Shows the representation of the tool path.

class.name: CATIMfgTPECutAreasUserHeader
class.abstract: Interface to add user commands in the cut areas tool bar of the tool path editor.

method.name: GetHeaders
method.abstract: Give the user's list of headers of command in the tool bar "Cut Area" of the tool path editor.

class.name: CATIMfgTPEExtraVisu
class.abstract: Interface to customize tool path editor visualization.

class.name: CATIMfgToolPathEditorHeader
class.abstract: Interface to create the sub-menu of the tool path in the PPR Tree.

method.name: GetHeaders
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of command headers in the tool path editor.

method.name: IsHeadersAvailable
method.abstract: Determines whether a list of command headers is available for a given set of objects.

class.name: CATIMfgToolPathEditorUserHeader
class.abstract: Interface to add user command to the sub-menu of the tool path in the PPR Tree.
